ComicInfo.Summary: The Monster Within Part Two: High-Tech Wreck: Shadowhawk seeks out the WildC.A.T.S to see if they can help him beat the AIDS virus. They transfer Shadowhawk's essence into one of Spartan's spare cybernetic bodies which appears to cure him but Paul "rejects" the transplant and the WildC.A.T.S have to restrain him and send him back to his old body.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Within Part Two: High-Tech Wreck
